column2: DanielsMom2009, 0-2 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Caregiver)
column9: This medication was prescribed for my 2 year old who was diagnosed with Eczema at 2mos. He developed the rash in his genital area and the cream worked for a littler under a year. We didn't use it continuously because he only had outbreaks when the climate changed. This recent outbreak was the worse because the weather went from the 90's to the high 50's over night. I put the cream on it and it cleared the irritation; however, it left my son with bleached skin around his mouth. Didn't use more than usual and am still clueless as to why it discolored his skin this time. As of right now we are discontinuing using this cream and moving on to something else.

column9: I have excema and went to the e.r. and was prescribed this medication. I was told not to use it longer then 2 weeks because of the side effects it could cause. 3 days short of the 2 week mark where it had healed my problems, it came right back worse then ever. Not happy at all.

column2: bob, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Great product-relief within 2 days of use after severe swelling and itching. Still using it after 1 month to control any re-occurrence, once a day under care of dermatologist.

column2: HeatherH, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I used mometasone on my face just to see if it would reduce the redness and bumps caused by Rosecia.  It worked in 1 day.  Redness, pustules, spongy texture of skin, itching all were gone after 24 hrs.  I use it 2 times a week to keep my face clear.  It was not prescribed for me but for my husbands rough skin patches on his ear.
I use this cream to stop the itching of poison ivy/oak which I get occasionally.

column2: In RHSC, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have a skin condition in & on my right ear, of all places, where it swells but isn't infected. I saw about 18 doctors of all sorts, and the last one gave me a rx for this just as an off-the-cuff; and nothing has ever worked better! Now, at the first sign of my problem, I apply the drops & the swelling is under control. After years of pain & frustration, to have this simple solution is so great!
